name: Penumbra (borbog)
description:
HOW TO PLAY?

1. Look at ground and click with left mouse button to place the candle

2. You can only walk on the ground lit by the candle

3. The candle's light must not shine on the creatures

4. Walk to the door of the house on the other side

CONTROLS

WASD - Movement

Left Mouse Button - Place Candle

Space / Right Mouse Button - Read Note

It's a Global Game Jam game from 2019.
Created with https://www.artstation.com/secret-de-lune
